content:
Ah, I see the core issue now. We don't have any wooden chests in our inventory. Let's check what we actually have available first:

# Check our current inventory
inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Current inventory contents: {inventory}")

# Check what entities are already placed
entities = get_entities()
print("\nExisting entities:")
for entity in entities:
    print(f"- {entity.name} at position {entity.position}")

# Get the mining drill specifically
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
print(f"\nMining drill details:")
print(f"Position: {drill.position}")
print(f"Status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Drop position: {drill.drop_position}")

This will help us understand:
1. What items we actually have available to work with
2. What entities are already placed in the world
3. The exact position and status of our mining drill

Then we can make a more informed decision about what to do next.
